sections.title: Syntax
sections.text_content: Draw.Line (x1, y1, x2, y2, Color : int)

sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Draw.Line procedure is used to draw a line on the screen from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) using the specified Color.
sections.text_content: The Draw.Line procedure is used to draw a line on the screen from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) using the specified Color.
sections.mdown_content:
The **Draw.Line** procedure is used to draw a line on the screen from (_x1_, _y1_) to (_x2_, _y2_) using the specified _Color_.



![Doc Image](draw_line01.gif)

sections.title: Example
code:
View.Set ("graphics")
        % First draw a line from the left bottom to right top
        Draw.Line (0, 0, maxx, maxy, 1) 
        % Now draw a line from the left top to right bottom
        Draw.Line (0, maxy, maxx, 0, 1)
sections.raw_content: This program draws a large X, reaching to each corner of the screen using color number 1. The maxx and maxy functions are used to determine the maximum x and y values on the screen. The point (0,0) is the left bottom of the screen, (maxx, maxy) is the right top, etc.
sections.text_content: This program draws a large X, reaching to each corner of the screen using color number 1. The maxx and maxy functions are used to determine the maximum x and y values on the screen. The point (0,0) is the left bottom of the screen, (maxx, maxy) is the right top, etc.

The **maxx** and **maxy** functions are used to determine the maximum x and y values on the screen. The point (0,0) is the left bottom of the screen, (**maxx**, **maxy**) is the right top, etc.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen must be in a "graphics" mode. See the View.Set procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "graphics" mode, an error will occur.
sections.text_content: The screen must be in a "graphics" mode. See the View.Set procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "graphics" mode, an error will occur.
sections.mdown_content: The screen must be in a "_graphics_" mode. See the **View.Set** procedure for details. If the screen is not in a "_graphics_" mode, an error will occur.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Draw.Line, not by calling Line.
